captions.text:
- HEY, JOHNNY,
I HOPE YOU DON'T MIND.

BEFORE YOU--
WE'RE GONNA ACTUALLY BRING OUT

SOME OTHER OF YOUR CAST
FROM THE MOVIE, BUT...

- THAT'S BAD.
WE DON'T GET ALONG.

- WE DIDN'T GET ALONG VERY WELL
DURING THE SHOOT.

- SO THIS MIGHT BE
A KNOCK-DOWN, DRAG-OUT.
I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO EXPECT.

- YOU'RE HERE SO RARELY,
I THOUGHT I WOULD

JUST GET SOME QUESTIONS
OUT OF THE WAY THAT I HAD.

YOU ENJOY PLAYING
WITH BARBIE DOLLS?

NOT AS MUCH
AS I USED TO, LET'S SAY.

- I MEAN, I--
WHEN MY DAUGHTER WAS LITTLE,
I PLAYED A LOT OF BARBIE.

- TOOK ME A WHILE TO GET,
YOU KNOW--

- TO STOP THE GAMES
WITH THE BARBIES?
- I GUESS IT'S WHEN I CAUGHT--

GOT CAUGHT BY MYSELF
WITH THE BARBIES

THAT'S ILLEGAL
IN A LOT OF PLACES.

- YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN?
- YOU CAN PLAY WITH BARBIES.

- YOU CAN SMOKE POT
WITH BARBIES.

- I DON'T KNOW HOW THIS
GOT ON HERE,
BUT, YOU SLEEP IN THE NUDE?

WELL, TECHNICALLY,
I'VE SLEPT IN ALLEYS.

SO IT'S NOT ALWAYS
IN THE NUDE, BUT...
- IT DOES OCCUR NOW AND AGAIN.

THAT IS TRUE, YEAH.
- ARE YOU A--

- THAT WAS A GREAT PASSION
OF MINE
WHEN I WAS A LITTLE KID.

- ARE YOU A GOOD
BASKETBALL PLAYER?

YOU LOVE TO PAINT PICTURES
OF ELEPHANTS?

- I DO.
- ARE YOU A GOOD PAINTER?

I PAINT LIKE A--
YOU KNOW, LIKE A TODDLER.

- I LIKE THE--YOU KNOW,
I LOVE ELEPHANTS, CERTAINLY.

I LIKE THE SHAPE
OF ELEPHANTS, YOU KNOW,

THE SORT OF VARIOUS SHAPES
IN TERMS OF PAINTING.

- AND HOW MANY ELEPHANTS
WOULD YOU SAY YOU'VE PAINTED?

- JUST GRABBING IT
OUT OF A HAT, YOU KNOW.

I WOULD LIKE
ONE OF YOUR PAINTINGS

title: True or False with Johnny Depp

comments.text:
I don't think someone can understand the love I feel for this man. He is 
absolutely 100% down to earth and super talented. He leads such an 
insperational life and I really adore that. Sweeney Todd, Pirates Of the 
Caribbean, Finding Neverland, Alice in Wonderland, Blow, What's eating 
Gilbert Grape, Cry-baby, Edward Scissorhands, Ed Wood. Wow, I'm speechless. 
He is the only actor that can make me cry the hardest bacause of his talent 
and realness. Edward Scissorhands is the first movie i've ever cried to. 
Finding Neverland was the second. What's eating Girlbert Grape was the 
third. I think this proves something. Oh, I forgot to mention that I've 
watched Sweeney Todd more times than I can remember. Johnny Depp is my 
favorite actor and he will always be my favorite actor. <3﻿

comments.author: D. Hull

comments.text:
+Lunar Aurora I did, actually. At school my year group did a fundraiser 
where we all took park in running marathons, did sponsored silences, helped 
out at charity shops, OAP homes, did gardening, packed people's shopping, 
walked people's dogs, washed people's cars, bake sales and put on a 
carnival. We raised £15,500 over a month, which is about $23,000. All 
donated to three charities. Not bad for a bunch of kids who had a solid 
income of $0.
